resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2406</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Single Slit Diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Single Schlitz-Beugung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choisissez La Diffraction de Fente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escolha O Diffraction Da Régua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scelga La Diffrazione Della Fessura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενιαία διάθλαση σχισμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escoja La Difracción De la Raja</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the diffraction of light through a single slit. The simulated experiment allow the user to change parameters of lit width, intensity and wavelength and to observe the chanes in the diffracted light.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Beugung des Lichtes durch
einen einzelnen Schlitz zeigt. Das simulierte Experiment 
erlauben dem Benutzer, Parameter von zu ändern beleuchtete Breite, 
Intensität und Wellenlänge und die chanes im gebeugten Licht zu 
beobachten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la diffraction de la 
lumière par une fente simple. L'expérience simulée permettent
à l'utilisateur de changer des paramètres de a allumé la largeur, 
l'intensité et la longueur d'onde et d'observer les chanes dans la 
lumière diffractée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre o diffraction da luz 
através de uma única régua. A experiência simulada permite 
que o usuário mude parâmetros de iluminou a largura, a intensidade e
o wavelength e observe os chanes na luz diffracted.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la diffrazione di 
luce attraverso una singola fessura. L'esperimento simulato 
permette che l'utente cambi i parametri di ha illuminato la larghezza,
l'intensità e la lunghezza d'onda ed osservi i chanes alla luce 
diffracted.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη διάθλαση του φωτός 
μέσω μιας ενιαίας σχισμής. Το μιμούμενο πείραμα επιτρέπει 
στο χρήστη για να αλλάξει τις παραμέτρους του αναμμένων πλάτους, 
της έντασης και του μήκους κύματος και για να παρατηρήσει τα 
chanes στο προξενημένο περίθλαση φως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la difracción de la
luz a través de una sola raja. El experimento simulado permite 
que el utilizador cambie parámetros de encendió anchura, intensidad 
y longitud de onda y observe los chanes en la luz difractada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beugung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systeme optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diffrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">difracción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
